subject: Aircraft Carriers
Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Organizers say it is all but certain that the Michigan State-North Carolina game on Veterans Day will be played on the aircraft carrier Carl Vinson, which carried Osama bin Laden’s body to a burial at sea.
snippet: Organizers say it is all but certain that the Michigan State-North Carolina game on Veterans Day will be played on the aircraft carrier Carl Vinson, which carried Osama bin Laden’s body to a burial at sea.
